text: just noticed this today, cool idea but it just looks a bit messy for me is there an option to turn it off
If you're talking about the emojis, that's actually on HS's end, not the extension. Would appreciate the option though, I'm personally not a fan as well
that’s odd they disappeared when i disabled the extension
really? could've sworn that was something HS did....
The plot thickens…

yeah specifically turning the ui tweaks and dev menu removes it
but i like all the other tweaks and dev menu
huh, yeah, guess it is the extension. We're all on the same page then :slightly_smiling_face:

<@U26BLKGE4> <@UDJV5B73R> They are part of the extension
If you turn off UI Tweaks/Dev Menu in the extension the emoji will go away.

I will add a feature to enable/disable that separately.

The beta testers when asked about what they thought of it didn’t weigh in much so I thought I’d try it out in the wild.

as a quick temporary solution until I can get the toggle, would you like the change as it is without the emojii?

What it does is renames the tabs to instead of saying “design manager” say
“DM|Portal Name|HS”

The other tweaks are great so i’ll keep it on, i don’t want to sound negative as it’s a great extension, but they just seem a bit busy when i’ve got far too many tabs open as always.

The short hand text makes sense though, hadn’t actually noticed because too many tabs…

Yea the emojii’s have been a kind of mixed bag for most of us. the goal was to make the tab titles more easy to glance at and know what portal and what part of HS you’re viewing.

The HS title names didn’t have any indicator of what portal you were in so if you were like me with a minimum of 40 tabs open concurrently, it was tedious trying to find the right tab

I’ll update the extension today to make it so that the emojii are not enabled but the other title tweaks are.

Then later we will add a toggle for the emojii
awesome dude, thanks!
Thanks that’s great

Update Pushed: Emojii removed from title tweaks
<https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/releases/tag/v1.04.0.55>
If the Emojii make you :exploding_head: Instructions on how to force update the extension at the link. Otherwise it can take up to a week for your browser to auto update.
Updated thanks!

Stats(from stable version) for fun:
213 HS devs are mac users
139 HS devs are windows Users
15 HS devs are chrome OS users
3 HS devs are Linux users.
1 HS dev is a Mac user running windows because he can
But what about Mac users that are using Windows on a Mac? Anyone... Just me.... :disappointed:
haha, no way to test for that
well I can tell you, you have 1 user :slightly_smiling_face:
haha
updated the stats :laughing:
lol oh believe me, it wasnt because I can, it was thanks to MS not having a good client for VSO (on Mac) when I started here lol
